/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a serene street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees on both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, a body of water glistens under the sunlight, adding a tranquil element to the bustling cityscape. The image beautifully captures the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
